channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- DN Footer Contacts
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- DN Footer Contacts

item.title: CVE-2024-3410|2024-07-09T06:00:03.519Z -- unknown -- dn%20footer%20contacts
item.description: The DN Footer Contacts WordPress plugin before 1.6.3 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
